transport.question: I have wheels and go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I take you to lots of places!
🚦 I follow the road
👪 Many people can ride in me

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm much bigger than a bird.
💺 You need a ticket to ride me.
✈️ I have wings and engines.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path
📢 I make a 'choo choo' sound
🚝 I can be very long.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a duck.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still
🚢 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I have a bell to let people know I am coming!
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
🚲 I need air in my tires.

transport.question: I am big and yellow, and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a special sign to stop other cars.
👧 I pick up children in the morning
🚌 I am bigger than a car

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I go very fast!
👨‍⚕️ Paramedics might be inside of me.
🚑 I rush to help when people are hurt

transport.question: I carry heavy things and can be very big. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I might carry bricks.
🚚 I have lots of wheels.
📦 I deliver things from one place to another.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a big ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🚒 Firefighters use me.
💦 I spray water.
🔥 I have a siren to warn people.

transport.question: I travel under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I go where the fishes live!
🤿 People can explore the ocean with me
⚓ I'm like a boat, but go underwater.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me!

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite snack for monkeys.
💛 My color is the same as the sun.
🍌 You can peel me to get to the yummy part.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red. An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on trees.
🍎 I am a popular fruit.
😋 I can be sweet or a little tart.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🧡 My color is similar to a sunset.
🐰 Bugs Bunny enjoys eating me.

food.question: I am white and cold. I am yummy in a cone!

hints.text: ❄️ I am frozen.
🍦 You eat me with a spoon.
😋 I come in many flavors, like chocolate and vanilla.

food.question: I am small and green, and you eat me in a pod. Snap!

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable.
🌱 I grow inside a shell that you can open.
🔊 My name is similar to 'please'.

food.question: I am made of milk, and I can be yellow or white. You can put me on a sandwich.

hints.text: 🐄 I come from cows.
🥪 I taste yummy with bread.
🐭 Mice really like me.

food.question: I am orange and sweet. I grow on a vine. You can make jack-o'-lanterns out of me!

hints.text: 🎃 I am popular in the Fall.
🧡 My color is the same as a monarch butterfly.
👻 People carve faces into me at Halloween.

food.question: I am a grain that can be brown or white. You can eat me with chicken or beans.

hints.text: 🍚 I am a staple food for many people.
🌎 I'm a very popular food in Asia.
💧 I need to be cooked in water.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I can be sliced and used to make sandwiches.

hints.text: 🍞 I am often brown or white.
🔥 I am baked in an oven.
🥪 You can put peanut butter and jelly on me.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. Inside, I am green and have tiny black seeds.

hints.text: 🥝 I come from a vine.
🇨🇳 I originally came from China.
🥄 You can scoop out my insides with a spoon.
